abstract: Jon Corzine's firm may yet be proved right in anticipating that Europe would not let countries like Italy and Spain default. But it will be too late.
snippet: Jon Corzine's firm may yet be proved right in anticipating that Europe would not let countries like Italy and Spain default. But it will be too late.
lead_paragraph: The graves of Wall Street, it has long been said, are filled with those who were right too soon.

headline.main: MF Global: Good Bets, Bad Timing?
